price: 108. ama maray ixxiga kah tontocowwime Qhuraan yaabbe waqdi Ni Rabbi koros kaa edde weelossu haytaamak saytunnooweh, Ni Rabbih xagni anguddubelem agaywaaga mali iyyan.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
